text: int gsum ( int * , int i , int j , int n ) ; int main ( ) { int n , * arr , i = 0 , num , j , n1 , sum ; scanf ( "%d" , & n1 ) ; while ( i < n1 ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; arr = ( int * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int ) * n ) ; j = 0 ; while ( j < n ) { scanf ( "%d" , & num ) ; arr [ j ] = num ; j ++ ; } sum = gsum ( arr , 0 , 1 , n ) ; printf ( "%d\n" , sum ) ; free ( arr ) ; i ++ ; } return 0 ; } int gsum ( int * b , int i , int j , int n ) { int n1 , n2 , k ; if ( i >= n ) return 0 ; n1 = b [ i ] + gsum ( b , i + j , j + 1 , n ) ; n2 = b [ i ] + gsum ( b , i + j + 1 , j + 1 , n ) ; if ( n1 > n2 ) return n1 ; else return n2 ; }
